chapter.title: Cold Chain Equipment Inventory (CCEI) System - Model Attribute

section.title: Model Attribute: Cold Chain Equipment Inventory (CCEI)
Model Attribute
section.para: To specify the model geometry and properties the user has to create model attributes where properties of each model defined.
To access Model Attribute user has to go to Maintenance -> dhis-web-maintenance-ccei -> Model attributes

section.title: Operations on Model Attribute
section.para: Filter Clear - Quick search and list the model type with edit and show details options
Add new - Add new model attribute
Show details - List shows name, description etc

screenshot.screeninfo: Show details - List shows name, description etc

section.title: Add a new model attribute
section.para: To add a new model attribute, the user has to click on "Add new" button in the model type management page, user will be directed to the following screen as show below, where he/she can fill the details to add a new model attribute
